CustomField.description: **DO NOT DELETE - USED IN WFR AND FLOW** When the status of a contact is equal to Active or Not Provisioned, the box is checked. This is then used as filter criteria on the Contact Opt In Flow.
CustomField.formula: OR( TEXT( Status__c ) = 'Active', TEXT( Status__c ) = 'Not Provisioned' )
CustomField.label: Status Active or Not Provisioned
